Package com.intellij.formatting

Class DependentSpacingRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.formatting.DependentSpacingRule

  • public class DependentSpacingRule
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds settings that should be used if dependent spacing target region changes its 'contains line feeds' status.

      • getData

        public int getData(DependentSpacingRule.Anchor anchor)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Allows to retrieve data associated with the given anchor.
        Parameters:
        anchor - target anchor
        Returns:
        data associated for the given anchor
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no data is registered for the given anchor (use hasData(Anchor) for the preliminary examination)
